attributes.action: Utilise the Event Industry’s workforce to support local community infrastructure
attributes.additional_details: The Events industry employs thousands of logistics Managers, Supply Chain Experts, Set builders, Construction workers, HGV drivers, skilled/unskilled labour, to name but a few. We have skill sets that are based around organisation and delivery. We all constantly work under the immense pressure of time based delivery. We can be used to build temporary facilities, support local community efforts, Deliver food and supplies to the vulnerable and sick, support in hospitals etc.
attributes.background: Use The Event Industry’s workforce to help support local efforts in fighting Covid-19. Utilise skill sets of workforce to help set up care for the most vulnerable and support local community efforts.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual organisations to decide what support they need, rather than for the UK Government or Parliament to dicate.
